altTitles.en: The Thing Which Has Fallen From The Sky

altTitles.pt-br: Sora no Otoshimono – Caiu do céu

description.en: Sakurai Tomoki is a normal student whose motto is "normal is the best". If there is one thing abnormal, it is that he often dreams of a girl whose face he cannot even remember, and when he wakes up from that dream, he would always be crying. He tried leaving it as just a dream… but one day, from the sky, an angel descended.
description.es: Me llamo Tomoki Sakurai. Mi lema es "La paz es lo mejor". ¿No es lo mejor lo normal?　Una de las cosas que no es normal... el sueño que tengo a diario; un sueño sobre una chica cuyo rostro no puedo recordar. Dejé el asunto, pensando que era sólo un sueño... Pero aquel día, un ángel cayó del cielo.
description.ja: 俺の名前は桜井智樹。モットーは「平和が一番」。普通が一番じゃあございませんか？　一つだけ普通じゃないもの…といえば、俺の良く見る夢。顔さえ思い出せない女の子の夢。たかが夢だと放っておいたんだが…。その日、空から、天使が降ってきた。
description.vi: Sakurai Tomoki, 14 tuổi, một học sinh trung học "bình thường" có phương châm là "Hòa bình và yên tĩnh là tốt nhất", và thường có ước mơ gặp gỡ một thiên thần. Cậu cảm thấy thật khó khăn để sống thoải mái khi anh phải đối mặt với bạn cùng lớp Sohara Mitsuki và cũng là người hàng xóm bên cạnh nhà cậu có võ karate giết người; Eishiro Sugata, một nhà khoa học lập dị với mong muốn khám phá ra "Thế giới mới"; và Mikako Satsukitane, chủ tịch hội học sinh tàn bạo của trường. Một hôm, để tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, cậu theo lời Sugata lên đỉnh ngọn đồi gần nhà chờ đợi. Bỗng nhiên, một hố đen hiện ra và… xuất hiện một-cô-gái-từ-trên-trời-rơi-xuống theo đúng nghĩa đen! Cô gái tên Ikaros, xưng là angeloid thế hệ Alpha, tự nhận Tomoki là chủ nhân của mình và theo cậu về nhà. Từ đó trở đi, nhiều sinh vật được gọi là "Angeloids" đến; sự yên bình của cậu đến đây là chấm dứt nhưng đồng thời tìm thấy những điều dễ chịu mà các Angeloids mang lại cho cậu, và chiến đấu với các điều tồi tệ xuống Trái đất.
description.pt-br: Sakurai Tomoki tem tido o mesmo sonho estranho desde que ele era criança e acordava chorando. Sugata, um veterano em sua escola, acredita que o sonho de ser o novo continente. Mais tarde, naquela noite, enquanto espera sob as cerejeiras por Sohara e Sugata, seus amigos de infância, quando algo cai em sua direção e dentro da cratera havia um anjo.

description.en: The series follows Kyouko Okita, a buxom housewife who's just recently moved into a new neighbourhood with her husband. There she tries to adjust to her new neighbourhood, make new friends, and deal with the quirkiness of her everyday life.
description.pt-br: A série segue Kyouko Okita, uma dona de casa que recentemente se mudou para um novo bairro com o marido. Lá, ela tenta se adaptar ao seu novo bairro, fazer novos amigos e lidar com as peculiaridades de sua vida cotidiana.

description.en:
Suzuki Saburo is the typical isekai MC. A high school boy who started to get into cooking after getting an injury during baseball, he suddenly found himself in another world one day. With the only thing on his person being his custom knife, he wandered a desolate prairie for three days before falling unconscious.   
  
When he woke up, he found that a nomadic tribe of elves took him in. However, there’s one big problem - the tribe has terrible cooking. Can Saburo help teach the nomadic elves the true meaning of deliciousness?  

---
**Links:**  

-  Alternative Raw: [Pixiv Comics](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3951)

_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼
description.vi: Bí mật giữa mình và cậu ấy tuy bình thường nhưng quan trọng!Hajime Takahashi nhập học tại trường cao trung Shuubi chỉ vì nơi đó là thánh địa trong bộ truyện tranh cậu yêu thích. Tất cả mọi ngóc ngách của trường đều được phác họa trong bộ truyện, điều đó khiến cậu phấn khích tột cùng! Giữa không khí hào hứng, Takahashi gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp giống hệt nữ chính trong tác phẩm yêu thích của mình, Yayoi Kurokawa, và họ đã sẻ chia bí mật của bản thân với nhau.

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___

description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

description.en:
Takasu Ryuuji has learned the hard way that appearances can be deceiving. For despite his inwardly sweet personality, his unintentionally sharp gaze and aggressive features give him the air of a delinquent thug, putting his chances at making new friends, let alone a girlfriend, next to zero.  
  
It's Ryuuji's first day of his second year of high school and it seems as if things are looking up. He gets to sit in between his only friend, Yuusaku, and more importantly, the girl he's secretly crushing on, Kushieda Minori. But just when he thinks the stars are aligned in his favor, he unwittingly crosses the most feared girl in school, Aisaka Taiga, making her into his arch enemy. To top it off, Taiga has moved in right next door to Ryuuji and happens to be Minori's best friend! Can this school year possibly get any worse?!
description.pt-br:
Takasu Ryuuji aprendeu da maneira mais difícil que as aparências podem enganar. Pois, apesar de sua personalidade doce por dentro, seu olhar involuntariamente assustador e características agressivas lhe dão um ar de um delinquente, colocando suas chances de fazer novos amigos e muito menos uma namorada próximas a zero. 

É o primeiro dia do segundo ano do ensino médio de Ryuuji e parece que as coisas estão melhorando. Ele começa a sentar entre o seu único amigo, Yuusaku, e mais importante, a menina que ele está secretamente apaixonado, Kushieda Minori. Mas só quando ele acha que as estrelas estão alinhadas em seu favor, ele involuntariamente arruma encrenca com menina mais temida na escola, Aisaka Taiga, fazendo-a seu arqui-inimigo. Mas confusões acabam juntando os dois já que Taiga mora ao lado do Ryuuji com interesses parecidos os dois se juntam para tentar conquistar seus objetivos! Este ano letivo pode ficar ainda pior!

altTitles.ja-ro: Itoshi no Nina

description.en: One afternoon, Atsushi's best friend from childhood, Masa, informs him, "I kidnapped Niina Aota." Niina, whose popular nickname is "Nina", is the girl Masa fell in love with at first sight on the train attending school. Atsushi found it unexpected and hard to believe, until he heads over to Masa's apartment and discovers that Nina has really been kidnapped….

altTitles.en: The Gal is Sitting Behind Me, and Loves Me -Maybe I'm Screwed Already-

description.en:
***My school life has changed drastically just because she likes me that I barely talk with?!***

Yuizaki Shino, one of the most beautiful girls in the school is a classmate of Fujiwara Sandai sitting behind him. It was only on a whim that Sandai helped her out despite spent his days studying and not having a single friend. It was supposed to be―

*"I couldn't wait for after school! ....Hey, hold on a minute?"*

That day and moment led Sandai to start dating Shino. They spend time together after school, they keep up with each other's hobbies, and they stay over frequently.... She's kind-sweet and always clings to him. And somehow, the other classmates started to pay attention to Sandai, they slowly changing his style appearance, and there was a lot of talks around his belt. He's more unsettled than when Sandai alone before. ....Well, this kind of school life isn't so bad, is it?

---

****Note: Earlier release chapter will be on Monthly Comic Dengeki Daioh before Comic Walker release***
description.ja:
何の接点も無い彼女に好かれた…だけで、俺の学園生活が激変!?

　うしろの席の同級生で、学校有数の美少女ギャル・結崎志乃。

勉強ばかりで、友達が一人もいない日々を過ごす俺が、彼女を助けたのは、ほんの気まぐれにすぎなかった。
そのはずが――

「放課後が待ち遠しかった！　……ね、ちゅーして？」

　その出来事をきっかけに、俺は志乃と付き合うことになった。
学校が終われば一緒に過ごして、お互いの趣味に付き合って、頻繁にお泊まりして……
彼女は優しく、いつも俺にべったり。

　さらにクラスメイトに注目されるようになって、俺の見た目を改造してくれたり、俺の周りも騒がしく。
一人の時より、落ち着かないんだが……ま、こんな学校生活も悪くはないか。

---

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

description.en:
The web manga centers around Bojji, a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back as "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king."  
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, "Kage" — a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming-of-age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
description.es:
Bojji es un príncipe sordomudo que vive en un mundo fantástico repleto de criaturas mágicas. Pese a no destacar en nada, y siendo incapaz ni siquiera de empuñar una espadita de niño, sueña con algún día convertirse en el rey más grande del mundo.

La gente lo considera un completo inútil y sin ningún talento para ser rey. Aunque la situación cambia cuando conoce a Kage, una sombra (literalmente) que es uno de los pocos supervivientes de un clan de asesinos y que intenta robarle las pocas pertenencias que Bojji llevaba encima.

De alguna manera, Kage logra comprender al príncipe y se convierte en su primer amigo verdadero, dando así inicio a la aventura que Bojji tanto anhela. Mientras tanto, en la oscuridad, un poder amenaza con devastar al reino.
description.ru: Боддзи удаётся найти своего первого в жизни друга, «Кагэ» — буквально тень на земле, которая каким-то образом хорошо понимает Боддзи. История рассказывает о взрослении Боддзи, о том, как он встречает разных людей в своей жизни, начиная с судьбоносной встречи с Кагэ.
description.vi:
"Bảng xếp hạng Quốc vương" xoay quanh Bojji, một hoàng tử điếc, vô năng, và thậm chí không thể cầm nổi thanh kiếm của một đứa con nít. Là con cả, cậu luôn cố gắng hết mình để tiến tới ước mơ trở thành vị vua vĩ đại nhất thế giới. Thế nhưng, luôn có những kẻ buông lời xì xào bàn tán sau lưng Bojji, bảo cậu là "một thằng hoàng tử bất tài", và "không đời nào có thể trở thành vua được". 

Bojji đã có người bạn đầu tiên của mình, "Kage", một bóng đen trên mặt đất, bằng cách nào đó lại có thể hiểu rõ về cậu. Đây là câu chuyện kể về sự trưởng thành của Bojji khi cậu gặp được những người khác nhau trong cuộc đời mình, bắt đầu từ lần gặp gỡ định mệnh của cậu với Kage.
description.pt-br:
O mangá da web comic gira em torno de Bojji, um príncipe surdo e impotente que não consegue nem empunhar uma espada infantil. Como filho primogênito, ele se esforça muito e sonha em se tornar o maior rei do mundo. No entanto, as pessoas murmuram sobre ele pelas costas como 'um príncipe inútil' e 'de jeito nenhum ele pode ser rei'.

Bojji é capaz de fazer seu primeiro amigo, 'Kage' - literalmente um ser vivo que é uma sombra no chão que de alguma forma entende Bojji bem. A história segue o amadurecimento de Bojji enquanto ele conhece várias pessoas em sua vida, começando com seu fatídico encontro com Kage.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 12, Cap 155. ]

title.en: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media

altTitles.ja: 禍話: SNSで伝播する令和怪談

altTitles.ja-ro: Magabanashi: SNS de Denpa suru Reiwa Kaidan

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

title.en: I Was Reincarnated as the Villain With Evil Eyes, so I Aim to Be a Mob Character

altTitles.ja: 魔眼の悪役に転生したので推しキャラを見守るモブを目指します

description.en: I was reincarnated as “Luxe,” the villain with the “Evil Eye” that appears in the game, but I didn’t want to meet a miserable end after being reincarnated into my favorite game! I decided to find happiness, I started training in “Dark Magic” from that day on in order to fight off the forces that attacked me insearch of the Evil Eye. And eventually, I’ll become a mob that watches over… my favorite characters! This is the story of how I, who was reincarnated as the villain of my favorite game, and my efforts to change my fate.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otogi Bukkoro Shiamu
Otogi Bukkorosseum

description.en:
"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."

Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales, but who's the strongest of them all!?

This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream, hopes, wishes, revenge and salvation, the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!

The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"

This tournament is filled with bloody carnage, if you want to win, you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.





This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Pinocchio, and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat, we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!



32 characters will engage in sudden transformations, bloody battles, and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ siêu cấp về nhà

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.en: I Become a Fool When It Comes to My Daughter

altTitles.ja: 今日も娘が可愛すぎます

description.en:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title.ja: Karami Zakari: Boku no Honto to Kimi no Uso

altTitles.ja: カラミざかり ボクのほんとと君の嘘

altTitles.en: Entanglement: My Truth and your Lies

altTitles.zh-hk: 錯綜複雜 我的真實與你的謊言

altTitles.ja-ro: Karamizakari

description.en: One day, four school friends, cross the line as they are interested to find out more about sex. Once you spark that flame though it is hard to go back and the bodies and minds of these four people begin to be intricately entwined. This is an adaptation of the "Karami Zakari" best-selling adult manga with over 1 million downloads which is reborn as a Seinen manga!
description.pt-br: Um dia, quatro amigos da escola ultrapassam os limites porque estão interessados ​​em saber mais sobre sexo. Depois que você acende essa chama, é difícil voltar atrás e os corpos e mentes dessas quatro pessoas começam a ficar intrinsecamente entrelaçados. Esta é uma adaptação do mangá adulto mais vendido "Karami Zakari", com mais de 1 milhão de downloads, que renasce como um mangá Seinen!

description.en:
Flora was born to become the main character, and 'I' will always stand behind her. Being sacrificed or beaten with wretched words didn’t matter if it made Flora shine every time. Because I thought that a role was just a role.
But Flora, I have to kill you and end this play now.

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

description.en: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

On the day of the entrance ceremony, Yuuhi Takamiya caught a mysteriously high fever and was bedridden for a week. To camouflage the fact that he was a loner, he creates a bookworm persona that becomes firmly established both for himself and others. Hearing his despair over wanting friends, a clumsy alien called Nano arrives from space to push some dubious goods on him... With Nano's outrageous products, Yuuhi's school life spirals into even greater chaos!
description.ja: 高校入学初日から一週間を謎の高熱で病欠。孤立していることを隠すために作り上げた読書キャラが自他ともに定着。高宮遊日は悲嘆に暮れていた！そんな遊日の「友達がほしい！」という悲痛な叫びに応えるように、ポコツン星人のナノが宇宙から営業（押し売り）にやってきて……。ナノのトンデモ商品によって、遊日の高校生活は更なる混迷を極めていく!!かわいくて、ちょっぴり刺激的な、宇宙スケールのドタバタコメディ開幕!

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini

altTitles.en: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated

description.en: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko no otera no CHION san

description.en:
Looking for peace, Gen Suda decided to attend high school somewhere far from his home, in another prefecture, where his distant relatives run the local temple, which will become Gen’s new home and the start of his new life shared with his formerly tomboyish older female cousin, Chion Koterasawa: hardworking, numb and indifferent - at least seemingly, and can appearances be trusted?

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pl: Pragnąc spokoju, Gen Suda postanowił zacząć uczęszczać do szkoły średniej na prowincji, gdzie wikt i opierunek zapewnią mu jego dalecy krewni sprawujący opiekę nad tamtejszą świątynią, w której to przyjdzie mu mieszkać wraz ze starszą od niego o 3 lata kuzynką, dawniej chłopczyca Chion Koterasawa: pracowitą, drętwą i obojętną – przynajmniej z pozoru, a czy pozorom aby na pewno wolno ufać?
description.pt-br: Neko no Otera no Chion-san é uma comédia romântica sobre um colegial chamado Suda Gen, que por problemas familiares, acaba tendo que se mudar e ir morar em um templo no interior administrado por parentes, onde moram sua Tia-Avó e sua Prima Koterasawa Chion.

altTitles.fr: Héros ? Ça fait longtemps que j'ai arrêté

altTitles.zh-ro: Ying xiong? Wo zao jiu bu dang liao

altTitles.ru: Герой? Я давно перестал им быть

altTitles.en: Hero? I Quit a Long Time Ago

description.en:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)
description.it: Zero fu il primo supereroe della razza umana. Sotto la sua guida, innumerevoli supereroi comparvero e crebbero seguendo le sue orme. Tuttavia, dopo cinque anni di guerra, Zero scomparve senza lasciare traccia. (*si legge da destra a sinistra, come i manga*).
description.pl: Zero był pierwszym prawdziwym superbohaterem ludzkości. Podczas jego aktywności pojawili się niezliczeni nowi bohaterowie, którzy podążyli jego ślady. Jednakże, po 5 latach walki, Zero zniknął bez śladu.

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

description.en: Panthera, a totalitarian state where both brutal oppression and despair exist. Heroes who resisted the government were branded as traitors and executed. Now, the son of a fallen hero, Eden, must face the question: Can he survive in Panthera? In the near future, after a second nuclear war, the surviving humans continue to live in a small world called Panthera. However, the intense control and exploitation by the government has caused immense suffering, gradually turning various districts into slums. The “heroes” who once defied the regime and claimed to be superheroes were ruthlessly eliminated by cyborg killers under the government’s command. The few surviving heroes now hide their identities, barely scraping by in the slums. Disillusioned and filled with grief and hatred, people who once had a glimmer of hope in these heroes have now lost faith and stopped waiting for any saviors. One day, a seemingly ordinary high school student named Eden, who is frequently bullied by his classmates, experiences a “Soma Awakening,” a unique trait of superheroes. However, haunted by the memory of his father’s gruesome death as a hero, Eden rejects the life of a hero, longing for a normal life with his mother. Yet, the increasing oppression of the government and the threats to his only family make this difficult. In such a world, will Eden choose to become a hero and stand against the forces oppressing society? The journey of Eden—a beautiful yet scorched, intense yet chilling tale—begins.

altTitles.zh: 魔女与圣女的使用方法

altTitles.en: Making Use Of Demons And Immortals Around Me

altTitles.zh-ro: Monu yu sheng nu de shiyong fangfa

description.en:
After remarrying, Dad and his beautiful stepmother embarked on a honeymoon abroad, leaving Aunt Qian He, who coincidentally shared the same birth year with San Qiu, to move in. 
Expecting the start of an unabashed life at first, it never occurred to San Qiu that his aunt was a Demon-slaying Celestial Being. San Qiu himself, much coveted among Demons alike, found himself a constant target by Demons… 
Not to mention his long-lost childhood friend, Xiao You turned out to be the greatest assassin of the Banished Celestial Agency, an organisation managed by Celestial Beings. Xiao You simply could not stand the sight of Qian He, who came between her and the love of her life…

altTitles.ru: Военный раб, ставший мастером боевых искусств

description.en:
The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ko:
강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의
무림 생존기를 그린 가족 무협 액션 드라마.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)

altTitles.en: Don't Mess with the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennou319)

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

altTitles.ja-ro: Nami Uchi Kiwa no Muromi-san
Namiuchigiwa no Muromi san

description.en: Mukojima Takuro is a lonely teenager who spends his time fishing at the pier and, to his incredible surprise, fishes up Muromi, a mermaid. Muromi first off doesn’t realize she's a mermaid until she meets Takuro. Not only that, she is incredibly dense and crazy and has a drinking problem to top it off. Now every time Takuro goes fishing, Muromi appears and makes life interesting for him.
description.vi: Một thằng ku cô đơn rảnh rỗi ra bờ câu phải một nàng tiên cá và cái kết...

description.en: The story is set on U.C. 0089 after the First Neo Zeon War, and will center on Jorn, an A.E.U.G. pilot who fought the Titans during the Gryps Conflict. The story will feature the appearance of such mobile suits as the AMX-003 Gaza, MS-14J ReGelgu, RMS-106 Hizack, and RMS-108 Marasai.

A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
As the only hope to stop the end of the world, I’ve lived 99 lives with everyone pressuring me to sacrifice myself. I dearly hoped this life would be my last…!

“A lady is born!”

I’ve ended up beginning my 100th life. They’re going to give me a hero treatment and sacrifice me again anyways. Is what I thought, but—

“Thank you for being born safely.”
“Unnie’s gon to get dem all for you!”
“Can I please see our youngest smiling as well?”
“Hey little baby, did you miss me?”

This life is a bit… weird.
description.es-la: Como la única esperanza para evitar la destrucción del mundo, esta es la 99ª vez que me veo obligada a sacrificarme. ¡Realmente esperaba que este fuera el final...! ‘¡Ha nacido una niña!’ Y así, comienza mi vida número 100. Nuevamente, me harán ser una heroína para sacrificarme, eso fue lo que pensé.  ‘Gracias por nacer a salvo.’ ‘De ahora en adelante, ¡yo té protegeré!’ ‘¿Puedes mostrarme tu rostro sonriente?’ ‘Cariño, ¿me extrañaste?’ Esta vida es un poco... ¿Rara?

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.es-la: Ella Es La Hija Perdida Del Emperador

description.en:
Embodying the culture that I experienced in my previous life,
A ‘reincarnator’ with the ability to make the empire flourish.
Rossite is able to use her unique ability, the power of implementation.
Being bullied by the reincarnator Karina she was even accused of attempting to murder the Duke of Identino, which lead to her execution.
At that moment, I recalled the memories of my past life as a paramedic,
Rossite realizes that she is the real reincarnator and regresses in the brink of death.
The first thing Rossite saw after her regression was Duke Identino, saying he has come to find the ‘Emperor’s lost daughter.’
Rossite goes to the imperial capital with him, but even there, Karina slanders Rossite by spreading rumors that she is a fake

title.en: Chiisana Kimi to, Koe wo Tooku ni

altTitles.ja: ちいさな君と、こえを遠くに

description.en:
Sota former vocalist of a popular band, having lost his former voice, he moves to a new high school where there is no one he knows to try to live quietly as Kanata Fujinami.
However, when he meets Sora, an elementary school girl who wants to become a voice actor, Kanata's dormant heart is moved and the story of Sora's journey toward her dream begins.
description.ja: 大人気バンドのボーカルをしていたソウタは、当時の声を失ったことで、誰も知らない転校先の高校で本名の藤波奏太（ふじなみかなた）としてひっそり暮らそうとしていた。だが、声優になりたい女子小学生・空（そら）と出会ったことで、奏太の心の変化と、空の夢へ向かう物語が始まる――。

altTitles.es-la: Humillando al jade y escogiendo a la perla

description.en:
When Ding Hanbai, the young master of the centuries-old jade-carving shop, first laid eyes on his timid shidi Ji Zhenzhu, he bullied him relentlessly, not expecting that Jiangnan could produce someone who would break down his defenses and melt his heart this way.   
They go from being unable to stand each other to admiring one another, but as the days pass, even this admiration begins to evolve…   
A step from brotherhood, a step to special affection, and one more step into a lifetime together.
description.es-la:
Cuando Ding Hanbai, el joven maestro de la tienda con cien años de antigüedad en la extracción de jade, puso sus ojos en su tímido shidi Ji Zhenzhu, él lo intimidó implacablemente, sin esperar que Jiangnan pudiera producir a alguien que derribara sus defensas y derritiera su corazón de esa manera.
Ellos pasaron, de no poder soportarse el uno al otro, a admirarse mutuamente, pero conforme los días iban pasando, incluso esa admiración fue evolucionando…
A un paso de la amistad, a un paso de un sentimiento especial, y un paso más hacia una vida juntos.
Nota: El título que escogimos para el manhua, se basó en uno de los varios significados de la palabra Crushing, y que se enfoca en la historia haciendo analogía en como "Ding que era un experto de tesoros, dejó de lado su pasión por estos y eligió su amor por Ji, su perla".

description.en:
After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！
